name: Suicide Hotline (ReeceGibbo)
description:
You are an operator of a suicide hotline, you must ask questions in order to keep her alive.

Art work made by KayleighMil123
Female Voice - KayleighMil123
Male Voice - ReeceGibbo
All sound made ourselves using household objects.

Note:
There is multiple death endings and also one ending where she survives, that is your goal.

Tutorial:
Pick question that you think the caller will be comfortable with.
If you make her too uncomfortable, bad things will happen.
If you make her comfortable and happy, good things will happen.
